CustomField.description: If this field is checked, the SchoolEmailNotification2__c will be sent a notification email when there is one or more disbursement confirmations awaiting the program.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this field is checked, the SchoolEmailNotification2__c will be sent a notification email when there is one or more disbursement confirmations awaiting the program.
CustomField.label: Disbursement Conf Required Notification
